text.text: Hi, everyone! I'm here to demonstrate the use of loading and saving XML documents with the GUI tool.

Sure! The tool spits out and loads XML documents, with a tree that contains dialogue nodes and choices for each node. The choices carry an ID for the next node and an 'effect', which can be anything you want it to be.
